testcase.name: TC06 The user can connect his Ornikar user account by entering his valid password and email
testcase.system-out: Given I go to the OrnikarAssurance-Auto page................................passed When I accept cookies.......................................................passed And I press <Connexion>.....................................................passed And I choose Ornikar........................................................passed And I entre a valid email...................................................passed And I entre a valid Password................................................passed Then I click on the sign-in button below the page...........................passed And I verify sign-in is done successfully...................................passed And I close the browser.....................................................passed

testcase.classname: Ornikar page Assurance-Auto Connexion/Créer un compte Ui Test
testcase.name: TC01 The user can create his Ornikar user account by entering all valid information.
testcase.system-out: Given I go to the OrnikarAssurance-Auto page................................passed When I accept cookies.......................................................passed And I press <Connexion>.....................................................passed And I choose Ornikar........................................................passed And I press on <je m'inscris>...............................................passed And I use the native keyboard to enter my firstname into the prénom input field.passed And I use the native keyboard to enter my lastname into the nom input field.passed And I use the native keyboard to enter valid date of birth in the Date de naissance input field.passed And I use the native keyboard to enter valid ZIP Code in the <Code Postale> input field.passed And I use the native keyboard to enter valid phone number in the <Numéro de téléphone> input field.passed And I use the native keyboard to enter valid Email in the <Adresse email> input field.passed And I use the native keyboard to enter valid password in the <Mot de passe> input field.passed And I tick the box <J accepte de recevoir des offres commerciales de la part d Ornikar.>.passed And I tick the box <J accepte et je comprends les conditions générales d utilisation et la politique de confidentialité d Ornikar.>.passed Then I press to <Je m'inscris>..............................................passed And I can create my account.................................................passed And I close the browser.....................................................passed
